sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The Text.WhatCol function is used to determine the cursor position's column.
sections.text_content: The Text.WhatCol function is used to determine the cursor position's column.
sections.mdown_content: The **Text.WhatCol** function is used to determine the cursor position's column.

sections.title: Example
code:
Text.Locate  ( 5, 10 )
        put "12345"..
        put "The current row is", Text.WhatRow
        put "The current column is", Text.WhatCol
sections.raw_content: This program outputs The current row is 5, the current column is 15.
sections.text_content: This program outputs The current row is 5, the current column is 15.
sections.mdown_content: This program outputs _The current row is 5_, _the current column is 15_.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: The screen should be in a "screen" or "graphics" mode. Text.WhatCol functions properly even if the cursor is invisible.
sections.text_content: The screen should be in a "screen" or "graphics" mode. Text.WhatCol functions properly even if the cursor is invisible.
sections.mdown_content: The screen should be in a "_screen_" or "_graphics_" mode. **Text.WhatCol** functions properly even if the cursor is invisible.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Text.WhatCol , not by calling WhatCol .
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling Text.WhatCol , not by calling WhatCol .
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling **Text.WhatCol** , not by calling **WhatCol** .

sections.title: See also
sections.raw_content: the Text.WhatRow function, which is used to determine the cursor row. See also the Text.Locate, Text.maxrow and Text.maxcol procedure.
sections.text_content: the Text.WhatRow function, which is used to determine the cursor row. See also the Text.Locate, Text.maxrow and Text.maxcol procedure.
sections.mdown_content: the **[Text.WhatRow](text_whatrow.html)** function, which is used to determine the cursor row. See also the **[Text.Locate](text_locate.html)**, **[Text.maxrow](text_maxrow.html)** and **[Text.maxcol](text_maxcol.html)** [procedure](procedure.html).
